name: Djas Puhr (V)
Lore: 'Male Sakiyan, a race often employed as assassins. Bounty hunter. Incredible infrared peripheral vision. Has excellent aural and olfactory senses. Often tracks by scent.',
Text: 'Power +3 under ''nighttime conditions''. Blaster Rifle deploys and fires for free on (and is a matching weapon for) Djas Puhr. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 while armed with a weapon).',
